content.question: A development that could best be used as evidence to support the argument in the excerpt is the passage of a law to

choices.label: limit the power of the president to conduct military policy
expand the federal government’s ability to investigate security risks
increase spending to support the social safety net
remove national origins quotas on immigration

content.answer: expand the federal government’s ability to investigate security risks

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
